DOC.brief_summary: This single center , multispecialty , randomize double blind placebo control feasibility clinical trial . The purpose evaluate safety , feasibility efficacy percutaneous transluminal angioplasty treat extracranial venous obstructive lesion , influence clinical outcome Multiple Sclerosis ( MS ) patient find chronic cerebrospinal venous insufficiency ( CCSVI ) .
